p: The study findings revealed several challenges influencing NIMART implementation ( Table 4). Nurse-initiated management of antiretroviral therapy -trained nurses reported that the healthcare organisation negatively influenced the implementation of NIMART training. Furthermore, they revealed that the PHC infrastructure was not well maintained and the facilities were also too small to cater for the increasing number of patients who wished to access PHC, including HIV services. Consequently, this could expose both staff and patients to cross-infection because of overcrowding.
